text: I’ll see if I can find some videos on YouTube or Vimeo of good roto to give you a better picture of what I mean. It all just comes with practice to be honest. Plus having a roto shot that is reasonably difficult on your showreel will stand you in good stead to get a job once you graduate. As a comper being able to do your own roto&prep is a godsend too as it makes you much more desirable to smaller companies who don’t necessarily have people to hand it off to
